thread.title: When Rahman met Pele
thread.title_full: When Rahman met Pele - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: When Rahman met Pele
text:
Guess who did Academy Award winner AR Rahman meet in Kolkata recently? The composer brushed shoulders with none other than the legendary football player Pele, who was in the city for the Legends Night at the Netaji Indoor Stadium on Monday.. It's been 38 years the ace footballer cast a spell at Kolkata's Eden Gardens and the football frenzy fans in the city were more than excited to have him amid them.
AR Rahman, had shared his excitement even before meeting the footballer, on his micro-blogging page. He posted, "Excited to meet Pele this evening in Kolkata!" He put up another post along with a picture after the meeting, "With the awesome Pele in Calcutta...!" Interestingly, Rahman, is scoring the music for Pele's biopic 'Pele: Birth of a Legend'.
